languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: When the Fighter pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Fighter as the priority target for their next attack.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}推开一名敌人，或战士的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}仅仅{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}一名敌人时，战士会成为该名敌人下次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: 当战士推开一名敌人，或战士的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}仅仅{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}一名敌人时，战士会成为该名敌人的优先目标，持续一次攻击。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Оттолкнув{/g} противника или {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поразив{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атакой по области{/g} только одного врага, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для следующей атаки этого противника.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: Оттолкнув противника или поразив {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атакой по области{/g} только одного врага, боец становится приоритетной целью для следующей атаки этого противника.
Оттолкнув противника или поразив {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атакой по области{/g} только одного врага, боец становится приоритетной целью для следующей атаки этого противника.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が敵を突き飛ばしたり、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}で敵1体だけに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、その敵はファイターを次の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}に選ぶ。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: ファイターが敵を突き飛ばしたり、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}で敵1体だけに{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、その敵はファイターを次の攻撃の優先ターゲットに選ぶ。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} empuja a un enemigo o realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que solamente {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de ese enemigo para su siguiente ataque.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el guerrero empuja a un enemigo o realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que solamente {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, se convierte en el objetivo prioritario de ese enemigo para su siguiente ataque.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}wegstößt{/g} oder mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} nur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird der Krieger zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} des nächsten Angriffs dieses Feindes.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Kämpfer einen Feind wegstößt oder mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} nur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, wird der Kämpfer zum Prioritätsziel des nächsten Angriffs dieses Feindes.

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattant{/g} repousse un ennemi ou ne {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} qu'un seul ennemi lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, cet ennemi choisit le Combattant comme {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour son attaque suivante.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that enemy chooses the Warrior as the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for their next attack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Combattant repousse un ennemi ou ne {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} qu'un seul ennemi lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, cet ennemi choisit le Combattant comme cible prioritaire pour son attaque suivante.
